read-all.premium-required-description: Be our Premium user to enjoy more features

search.title: Search
search.description: You can find any word across all lessons.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.help-translation-description: We've opened the translation process up to the community because you know best how Minna no Nihongo should be translated into your language. Please participate as much as you like in translating, voting, and discussion.
feedback.tts-instruction-description: Please make sure you have enable "Text to speech" feature and install a Japanese language pack. We recommend using Google text to speech engine.

about.title: About
about.purchase_title: You are our premium user now
about.purchase_item_description:
- Remove Ads
- Premium features for lesson 3 - 50:
  - Listening: listen to the pronunciation and choose the correct answer, answers can be shown in Kanji, Romaji or English
  - Quiz: test your fluidity in translating Hiragana, Katagana, Kanji or Romaji to one and another
  - Read All: pronounce every word in the lesson and followed by its meaning
about.purchase-item-description-android:
- Remove Ads
- Premium features for lesson 3 - 50:
  - Listening: listen to the pronunciation and choose the correct answer, answers can be shown in Kanji, Romaji or English
  - Quiz: test your fluidity in translating Hiragana, Katagana, Kanji or Romaji to one and another
  - Read All: pronounce every word in the lesson and followed by its meaning (please make sure TTS works on your device before purchasing)
about.restore_failed_title: You have never purchased our Premium before

common.tts_required: Google Text-to-Speech is required for using this app

rating.title: Enjoy our APP?
rating.title_description: Please give us 5 stars to cheer we up if you like this app.
rating.feedback_description: Don't like our APP? Give us some feedbacks. We will definitely keep improving.
